alert.note: Alert for Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 09 at 12:00PM MST until January 09 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph for the city of Casper and area highways. Gusts 60 to 75 mph expected for the north face of Casper Mountain and higher elevations. * WHERE...Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range, Natrona County Lower Elevations and Casper Mountain. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and damage power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should be careful in forested areas and around trees. Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Casper Mountain; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Natrona County Lower Elevations
